name: Fly Game Project
description:
This game is a pretty basic platformer that I made for a university module.

It has AMAZING features such as:

  • running
  • jumping
  • dashing
  • jumping again
  • shooting
  • checkpoints
  • death

It's just a basic student game, it should take around 10-15 minutes or so to finish as there are only 3 levels, one being the tutorial.

You are a fly person scavenger whose goal is to collect valuable scrap inside a huge scrapyard that is within a cave-world.

My biggest focus was making the assets but there is some stuff I couldn't really get done in time, like shooting while walking or particle effects and stuff.

It's still a bit rough, mainly with stuff like Unreal capsule colliders being weird when touching a corner or the projectiles destroying themselves when hitting a wall only in the editor and not the build.

Controls:

  • Movement - WASD or arrow keys
  • Jump - W, up arrow or X
  • Dash - Shift, Z or Numpad 0
  • Shoot - C or Numpad 1 
  • Mute - M
  • Pause - P or Esc
